name: DigiPen GameJam 2 - Ninja Platformer
description: This is a game I made in collaboration with a few other High School DigiPen students. I personally created the Enemy AI, The Boss, and level 6 and 7 as well as  some weapon interaction and physics. We only had a botu a week and a half  to create it, and many of the other team memeber were not able to contibute very much due to scheduling or other constraints, so it was not nearly as polished as I would have liked. However, I think it is interesting nonetheless. Hope you  enjoy out garbage fire!
